Rules

Cards are configured by creating rules. All the rules impacting a given card can be accessed from its card menu via the "advanced" item. Here are the site-wide defaults:
{{*all|open}}
[[https://decko.org/rules | More about rules.]]

Accounts

Accounts are represented in cards, too. You first create a [[Sign up]] card, and that then turns into a [[User]] card.
{{Sign up|closed}}
{{User|closed}}
  • When [[Anyone]] can [[*create|create]] a [[Sign up]] card, links to sign up will appear.
  • When [[Anyone]] can [[*create|create]] a [[User]] card, sign-ups can be authenticated with a token.
  • When only other [[Roles]] can [[*create|create]] a [[User]] card, sign-ups must be approved by hand.
[[https://decko.org/account | More about accounts.]]
